The amplitude of loaded transmission errors that generate vibrations and noise are made by design of parabola coefficient of tool plunging and parameter of parabola apex. The coefficient has been introduced as the simultaneous pairs of meshing teeth in order to calculate the contact ratio in a meshing cycle. Three techniques are considered in the paper: local synthesis, tooth contact analysis (TCA) and loaded tooth contact analysis (LTCA). The developed theory is illustrated with numerical examples. The results confirm that a gear drive with minor transmission errors and contact ratio to be about 3.0 or higher could be obtained.

keywords.kw: assembly aerospace propulsion system, transmission errors, contact ratio, face-gear

article_rec.title: The Design and Tests in a Three Interconnected Fluidized Bed

abstract.par: Hydrogen production based on chemical looping combustion can obtain clean hydrogen with near zero emission of carbon dioxide. This technique can be auto-thermal, making it very promising for hydrogen production. In this paper, the interconnected fluidized beds were established for cold model study, and tests were carried out, aiming at providing some design information for the hot bench. Experiments were mainly performed to reveal the effects of gas velocity of the three reactors (gasification reactor, fuel reactor and air reactor) on the pressure distribution of the system. The results indicated that the gas velocity of the fuel reactor and air reactor exhibited similar effects on the system pressure, but the gas velocity of the gasification reactor displayed an opposite effect.

keywords.kw: chemical looping combustion, hydrogen production Interconnected fluidized beds

article_rec.title: The Design of a Simple Laser Shaft Alignment Instrument

abstract.par: A laser shaft alignment based on single LD—PSD was designed in this paper. And the system’s mathematic model was built. The laser shaft alignment can realize automatic continuous measurement. The measurement system is very simple, useful and inexpensive. The model machine testing shows the measuring precision, reliability and anti-jamming ability are higher than like product. It can meet the requirement of coaxiality measuring in shafting.

keywords.kw: Laser Collimation Light sourer, PSD Devices, Spot, shaft alignment

article_rec.title: The Design of Bionic Leg and Motion Simulation on Passive Dynamic Bipedal Robot

abstract.par: To improve the walking stability of the passive bipedal robot with knees, a four-linkage multiaxial bionic knee is implemented in the robot leg, developing a new kind of passive-dynamic bipedal robot. A 3D dynamic simulation model of the robot walking on a slope is established in MSC. ADAMS and a numerical simulation is performed simultaneously. The robot’s smooth walking was achieved, which contributes to understand the nature dynamic characteristics of human walking, and provide a clue to improve the bipedal robot’s dynamic performance.

keywords.kw: Passive Dynamic, Bionic Joints, Bipedal Robot

article_rec.title: The Design of the Monitoring Circuit for the Rocket Ignition Process

abstract.par: In ignition process of the space rocket engine, design of the monitoring circuit is very important. If the monitoring circuit can not reliably work, separation of the rocket engine will be greatly affected, thereby the safe ignition of the rocket engine will be affected. In this paper, aiming at the real problem in the ignition process, the monitoring circuit has been improved on the design. A large number of tests showed that the improved monitoring circuit can run reliably. In addition, the safe ignition for the rocket engine can be realized by the application of it.

keywords.kw: Rocket Engine, Monitoring Circuit, Safe Ignition

article_rec.title: The Development of Tool Compensation Software for 5-axis CNC System

abstract.par: The Five-axis CNC Machine are widely used with machining accuracy more and more higher. However, the tool compensation in Five-axis linkage CNC Machining can’t be solved effectively with the aids of the existing solution methods. In this paper, a new tool compensation algorithm module is proposed on the basis of the existing tool compensation theory, which is verified by computer simulation.

keywords.kw: 5-axis linkage machine tool, tool compensation

article_rec.title: The Discussion of Water-Saving Technology about Water Supply and Drainage in Building

abstract.par: According to the present situation of building water supply and drainage, analyzing the water-saving techniques of building water supply and drainage to achieve effective utilization of water resource. The water-saving techniques mainly include reasonably limiting the pressure of water distribution points and avoiding overpressure flow, perfecting hot water supply system and reducing ineffectual cold water, adopting water-saving water-dispensing fixtures and sanitary ware, promoting the utilization of high-quality pipe and valve, and improving the current construction of fire pool as well as developing and promoting the technology of utilization of reclaimed water and rainwater.

keywords.kw: building water supply and drainage, water conservation, techniques

article_rec.title: The Effect of Combustion Chamber Geometry and Injection Timing on Diesel Emission

abstract.par: To improve the soot emissions performance of a common rail diesel engine, two combustion chambers with different diameter-depth ratio were designed under the conditions of the same compression ratio, and using CFD software to simulate the combustion process with different chamber shape and injection timing. The results showed that NOx emissions decreased with the delay of the injection timing, while soot emissions increased. In the different combustion chambers, chamber B had lower soot emissions.

keywords.kw: diesel, combustion chamber, emission, injection timing, soot

article_rec.title: The Effect of Magnetic Radiation on Pipeline Transportation of Crude Oil

abstract.par: The deposition of paraffin wax during the pipeline transportation impedes the flow of crude oil and eventually blocks the pipelines. The hot oiling method is extensively used to control the wax deposition in the oil industry. Consequently, a huge amount of energy is consumed to heat the crude oil by hot water or electrical power every year. In order to save the energy cost, the magnetic paraffin control technology is presented and evaluated with the hot oiling method, and accordingly the effect of the magnetic radiation on the oil transportation is detailed. The experiments carried out have demonstrated that the magnetic treatment can compensate for the resistance rising of the pipeline caused by the hot water reduction. Especially, the transportation of crude oil (at the surrounding temperature of -10°C~-30°C) without any heating has been observed in the Daqing oil field under the radiation of a magnetic field of 120 mT. In addition, the effect of the length of pipelines on the performance of magnetic treatment was also investigated.

keywords.kw: magnetic treatment, magnetic paraffin control technology, magnetic viscosity reducing, pipeline transportation, oil gathering

article_rec.title: The Environmental Risk Assessment of Herbicide Glyphosate on Various Chinese Cultivated Soils

abstract.par: Glyphosate is the herbicide widely used in China. However, little is known on the processes governing the environmental fate of glyphosate in soils and its environmental risk for groundwater. Laboratory experiments were performed to evaluate the degradation, adsorption, and leaching behavior of glyphosate in three agricultural soils with high sand content and different soil organic carbon content. Glyphosate degraded very fast in soils, the half-lives of glyphosate for the three soils were between 3.3 d-6.9 d, and the main metabolite of glyphosate was amino methyl phosphonic acid (AMPA). The adsorption coefficient (KF) values for the three soils were were 93.99 (loam), 89.31 (clay) and 61.05 (sand), which may mean that the organic matter is not the key for glyphosate adsorption on soil. Leaching tests, performed in manually packed soil glass-plate, indicated that glyphosate moved very slowly on the three types of soil thin layer, it mainly stayed at the zone of 0-2 cm. Thus, the leaching behavior of glyphosate coincided well with the results of the batch sorption and degradation experiments. All the data showed that glyphosate had a low potential threat to groundwater.

keywords.kw: glyphosate, environmental behavior, risk assessment, pesticide

article_rec.title: The Equipment Development of Detecting the Beer Bottles' Thickness in Real Time

abstract.par: In recent years, the requirement of beer bottle quality becomes ever-strict, so the annual detection can’t satisfy the requirement of a modern industry, in this paper, we design a equipment which can detect the beer bottles’ thickness in real time. The measurement system takes the chip computer W77E58 as the core, and takes the theory of ultrasonic measurement as the basis, we can observe directly the thickness of the detected beer bottle and judge the bottle is qualified or not by the visualization software. Through the analysis of experimental data, ultrasonic testing is relatively stable, it can meet the requirement of modern industry.

keywords.kw: Ultrasonic, Real Time, Running Gear, Visualization Software

article_rec.title: The Fuzzy Neural Network Control of Hoist Constant Deceleration Braking System Based on Genetic Algorithm

abstract.par: The constant deceleration braking of the conventional hoist is a fuzzy control system with low accuracy and big overshoots. The fuzzy neural network is used to optimize the hoist constant deceleration braking system, and the design scheme is developed. The artificial neural network structure and parameters are trained with the fuzzy control rules. The membership functions of the fuzzy control rules are determined by using the neural network’s self-learning and adaptive ability. The genetic algorithm is adopted to train the controller’s connecting weights. The global optimum of the network’s parameters can be achieved. Matlab simulation results indicate that the hoist’s braking control system with fuzzy neural network is more dynamic, robust, and highly precise.

keywords.kw: Constant Deceleration Braking, Genetic Algorithm, Fuzzy Neural Network

article_rec.title: The Heat Transfer Model and Performance Analysis of Fibre-Enhanced Phase Change Material

abstract.par: Energy storage technology plays an important role on energy utilization system. The fibre-enhanced phase change material tightly combines fibre having good heat conduction property with general phase change material (PCM). It can improve the heat conduction performance of general PCM. Several parameters influencing the heat transfer performance of the whole heat storage system are studied here on the basis of heat transfer model in term of enthalpy theory. As results examined, the best approaches of obtaining excellent heat transfer performance of fibre-enhanced PCM are increasing NTU(heat transfer structure factor), the number of radial fibre and reducing i B (a criterion pinpointing the key component). The less efficient ways are increasing the heat conduction coefficient of fibre and the radius of fibre. This work will provide some references to how to optimally design the fibre-enhanced phase change heat storage system.

keywords.kw: Energy storage, Phase change material, Heat Transfer

article_rec.title: The Impact of Hydroelectric Energy Development on Fish Habitat

abstract.par: This paper makes a brief analysis on the adverse effects the hydroelectric energy development does to fish habitat, and proposes that we should pay attention to the protection of fish habitat. The measures in present ecological restoration to reduce the adverse effects are concluded, and also, we analysis how these restoration measures to protect fish habitat. It’s proposed to combine several compensation measures to reduce the adverse effects to fish habitat utmost. So, this paper can provide advices on the protection of fish habitat.

keywords.kw: hydropower, development, energy, habitat

article_rec.title: The Influence of Crank Speed of Bush Reciprocating Cutter on Bush Cut

abstract.par: Bush is one of raw material for biomass fuel in China. Crank speed is an important parameter in the design of bush reciprocating cutter. A reciprocating single blade cutting test equipment was made in this paper. One factor test was done to study its influence on maximum cutting force of bush. Other tests were done to study the interaction of cutting edge angle and crank speed, as well as sliding cutting angle and crank speed. It is found that: The crank speed has significant influence on the bush cutting force and cutting surface. There is certain interaction between crank speed and sliding cutting process.

keywords.kw: bush, crank speed, test equipment, maximum cutting force, test study

article_rec.title: The Influence of SG Modification on the Microstructures of High Manganese Steel

abstract.par: The influence of SG modification on as-cast and heat-treated microstructures of high manganese steel was investigated. The results show that SG modification can refine austenite grain and intergranular carbides, reduce the quantity of pearlite of as-cast microstructures. For heat-treated microstructures, SG modification can shorten holding time or lower holding temperature of water-quenched treatment. The roles of SG modification have especially practical significance to high-carbon or alloyed-type high manganese steel.

keywords.kw: high manganese steel, SG modification, microstructure

article_rec.title: The Key Correlation Between Plastic Gear Modification and Rack Tool Tip Modification

abstract.par: In order to decrease the defects of the plastic gear design and manufacturing appears increasingly, the correlation between plastic gear modification and rack tool modification are ratiocinated based on domestic and abroad information. The question whether rack tool modification effects plastic gear modification during the manufacturing is discussed, and the maximum tooth root fillet modification theory is proposed. Finally, the trial-error theory is applied to resolve minimum tip thickness problem for small gear, which validity is verified by applying this theory on the design analysis of helical gear.

keywords.kw: plastic gear modification, rack tool tip modification, maximum fillet theory, trial-error theory

article_rec.title: The Least Squares Surface Optimization Based on Orthogonal Function

abstract.par: It is always necessary to improve fitting order and increase surface control points with least squares method for surface fitting to meet the accuracy of surface reconstruction, however, with the increasing of control points, the surface smoothness and curvature continuity become worse. According to the inadequacy of the least squares method for surface fitting, the surface optimization algorithm based on orthogonal function is proposed in this paper, which can ensure both reconstruction accuracy and surface smoothness. 3x3 order surface and 36 control points are applied in surface fitting with the maximum error only 0.057mm in surface reconstruction, as well as the surface is G2 continuous. Experimental results show that the proposed optimization algorithm achieves the best matching of surface control points, surface curvature and reconstruction precision, and improves the quality of surface fitting.

keywords.kw: reverse engineering, optimization algorithm based on orthogonal function, surface reconstruction, reconstruction error

article_rec.title: The Merging of Water Droplets Base-on Metaball

abstract.par: Generating realistic world containing water is among the most challenging aspects in virtual reality. One important area in computer graphics simulations for water is the animation of droplets, which is vital for driver simulators. The method for rendering water droplets which is proposed in this paper originates from the method that is published by Yu et al [11]. For speed and practicability purposes, we use GPU-based approaches to generate realistic images of water droplets. Modified metaball technique are used to approximate the merging of water droplets and this model can also be apply to the real-time systems completely due to our optimization for the 3D metaball.

keywords.kw: water droplets, metaball, merging, modeling, real-time rendering

article_rec.title: The Mesh Characteristics of Arch Cylindrical Gear and Its Digitization Analysis

abstract.par: As a new kind of cylindrical gear, the in volute arch cylindrical gear has preferable transmission characteristics, but its main geometry parameters have no unified standard. In this paper, the ideal geometry parameters of in volute arch cylindrical gear are proposed and its tooth surface equation and meshing line equation are discussed. For verification, the computer graphics is introduced to show the meshing characteristics. By programming, tooth surface and meshing line are discretizesd, fetching some points and linking these points by short straight line to present the lines and surfaces which are visualized to show meshing characteristics. Simultaneously, a process way for arch cylindrical gears is proposed.

keywords.kw: Cylindrical gear, Geometry parameter, Meshing characteristic, Digitization analysis

article_rec.title: The Method Descending the Order of the Multidisciplinary Robust Control Model for Electric Power Steering Systems

abstract.par: With improving the people’s requirements on the vehicle driving comfort, safety and energy conservation, robust control algorithms are widely used in the electric power steering (EPS) control systems. Aiming at the poor real-time and high cost of the robust controller for high order, the descending order method based on the optimal integral square error (ISE) model is proposed. The method is used to descend the robust controller order of the EPS system. And simulating and comparing with the descending order method based on the optimal Hankel norm, the results show that the descending order method based on the optimal ISE has better results, and the order-reduced system has very good robustness.

keywords.kw: electric power steering, multidisciplinary H8 control, descending the order for model, robust control

article_rec.title: The Modeling and Simulation Method to Calculate Force in the Equivalent Substitution Flank Profile Two Tooth Difference Cycloid Pin Gear Reducer Cycloid Gear

abstract.par: The text uses analysis method to accurately calculate primary clearance when profiled equivalent substitution cycloid gear and pin teeth were meshing together, and gives a force calculating method meet the actual of the project when equivalent substitution flank profile two teeth difference cycloid gear and pin teeth were meshing together with a clearance.

keywords.kw: Equivalent Substitution, Dynamic Analysis, Planet Drive

article_rec.title: The Modeling of Trajectory Deviation and Deviation Direction in Aluminum Hot Tandem Mill

abstract.par: In hot tandem mill process, aluminum strip steering is external manifestation, which is lateral asymmetric of rolling parameters. the paper extract lateral asymmetric characteristics of rolling parameters and study mutual functional relation of several feature parameters and transformation compensation relationship of lateral asymmetric characteristics between strip delivery thickness and strip delivery speed, and build the explicable mechanism model of strip steering. On the basis of explicable mechanism model, we can solve for the model of strip steering trajectory and the model of strip steering direction. According to the model of strip steering trajectory, we can calculate to get time-dependent strip steering quantity after strip is out of rolling area. According to the model of strip steering direction, we can judge the direction of strip steering by the direction of each disturbing quantity or the change of on-line observable bilateral roll force error, which provide theoretical support for strip steering control.

keywords.kw: Strip Steering, Asymmetry, Modeling

article_rec.title: The Physical and Chemical Properties of Fly Ash from Coal Gasification and Study on Its Recycling Utilization

abstract.par: Aiming at the difficulties in utilization of fly ash from coal gasification, the physical and chemical properties of fly ash were investigated. This research studied recycling utilization on using fly ash as one of cement raw materials for cement clinker. Results showed that fly ash belongs to ordinary solid waste of siliceous and aluminous materials. Cement clinker could be generated by substituting fly ash for shale with different type limestone. The study not only solves the environment pollution problem caused by piling of fly ash, but also realizes its recycling utilization.

keywords.kw: fly ash, X-ray diffraction (XRD), Scanning Electron Microscope (SEM), recycling utilization

article_rec.title: The Preparation and Property of Few-Layered Graphene/Benzalkonium Chloride Composite

abstract.par: In order to research and development a novel antibacterial material which is used to deal with the drinking water, few-layered grapheme/benzalkonium chloride composite was prepared by introducing different content of quaternary ammonium salt into layered graphene, and the resulting composites were characterized by the FTIR, XRD, TGA and TEM. And minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC) was used to investigate antibacterial activity. The FTIR, XRD and TEM data show that benzalkonium chloride is intercalated into layered graphene. Combined with low cost, such materials should have wide application to drinking water treatment.

keywords.kw: graphene, benzalkonium chloride, antibacterial, water treatment

article_rec.title: The Pure Heat Conversion Coefficient Analysis Method for Thermal System in Supercritical Pressure Power Unit with Double Reheat Cycles

abstract.par: Due to double reheat and using cross-level superheat with outer steam cooler, the thermal economic analysis of double reheat supercritical plant is far more different from once reheat unit, so it brings some obstacles to the former one’s energy-saving analysis. For this reason, pure heat conversion coefficient, which is one important parameter for double reheat unit, is defined, and its general matrix form is deduced, so the thermal economic analysis of double reheat unit can be done with one of extraction steam efficiency. In this way, a new method of thermal economic quantitative analysis is offered, and a complete model of quantitative economic calculation forms. Through some case calculations, the reliability of the model proved that it is common, accuracy and suitable for computer calculation.

keywords.kw: double reheat unit, thermodynamic system, thermal economy, pure heat conversion coefficient, matrix method

article_rec.title: The Research and Realization of the Ultra-low and Constant Speed Control Technology About the Cylinder for the Large Caliber Pipe Bender

abstract.par: The ultra-low and constant speed control is one of the key techniques that the large caliber pipe bender can use to achieve bend automatic process. This technology which could analyze the working requirements of the pipe bender’s heating, introduces the single-cylinder pulling and bending driving form and uses the hydraulic control technique to realize the stationary and reliability in the cylinder’s ultra-low speed motion. Additionally, it will prevent the phenomenon of vibration and arc ridging in the process of thin-wall pipe’s bending and assures a high quality of large bend caliber pipes with different bending radiuses and bending angles. At the same time, this technology could also be promoted and applied in any hydraulic controlled devices which need a stable and low-speeding operation.

keywords.kw: large caliber pipe bender, ultra-low and constant speed, cylindeIntroduction

article_rec.title: The Research of 7000 m Deep-Ocean Rock Drill

abstract.par: The 7000 m deep-ocean rock drill is an important equipment of prospect for ocean mineral resource. It is made up of orientation outfit, turning outfit, pushing outfit, drill tool, framework, control system and safeguard system, etc. The main parameters are accounted, and the basic structure, function, working principle and technical parameters of the 7000 m deep-ocean rock drill are introduced in this paper. The key technical difficulty of drill tool manufacture, tiny landform adaptability, safeguard system, the control of low force when chisel in, the control of weight with whole machine are resolved.

keywords.kw: sea mineral resource, deep-ocean rock drill, structure

article_rec.title: The Research of a Equipment for Detecting and Monitoring Process

abstract.par: in the automated machinery manufacturing system, In order to improve the quality of work piece and assurance the normal operation of the working system, we often need to examine and monitor the process of the working and condition of the system. Author uses mathematical statistic analysis principle and design an equipment which can measure the wok piece size in real time and control the working process by itself. By using this equipment, we can control the quality of the work piece, decrease the rate of waste products, increase the efficiency of machine work, improve the stationeriness of working process. In this article, we describe and introduce the working principle of the equipment for detecting and monitoring process, and show the specific implementation of the programme.

keywords.kw: measuring in real time, process engineering of detecting and monitoring, ability of craftwork, stability of working precess

article_rec.title: The Research of Affecting Factors of Bio-fuel High Dense Shaping at Room Temperature Based on SPSS

abstract.par: There are factors which involve with pressure and moisture content in the orthogonal design for the bio-fuel high dense shaping at room temperature. Make use of SPSS to carry out ANOVA analysis and Range analysis which can indicate how the shaping density is influenced by the different pressure and moisture content and judge the importance of the two factors for shaping density of bio-fuel. This research may provide some design data for bio-fuel high dense shaping technology at room temperature.

keywords.kw: spss, pressure, moisture content, density, range analysis, ANOVA, bio-fuel high dense shaping at room temperature

article_rec.title: The Research of Control System Based on Sliding Mode Variable Structure Control for the Photoelectric Stabilized Platform

abstract.par: Stability control is one of the core technologies of the photoelectric stabilized products. It is difficult for classical control theory to deal with the conflict between the overshot and rapidity and to get satisfied dynamic performances. This paper set up the system mathematical model firstly, and a variable structure controller with integral sliding mode was designed based on the simplified model. Dynamic performance simulations and experiments show that the control system realizes zero overshot and rapidity, and its dynamic performance is better than that of the classical control system. The research provides a new stabilized control method for congeneric products.

keywords.kw: Photoelectric Stabilized Platform, Sliding mode, Variable structure, Real-time operation system

article_rec.title: The Research of FP-Growth Method Based on Apriori Algorithm in MDSS

abstract.par: The paper mainly discussed The Application of the Model_FP based on Apriori algorithm in MDSS. FP-Growth algorithm based on frequent pattern growth (frequent-pattern growth referred to as FP-growth) model - model Model_FP, it has taken the following sub-rule strategy: frequent item sets will be provided to a frequent pattern database compression tree (or FP-tree), but remains set of related information items, then, will take this compressed database into a set of the database (a special type of projection database), each associated with a frequent item, and were excavated each database. FP-growth method will change find long frequent patterns to find the problem into a number of short-recursive mode, then connect the suffix. It uses the least frequent items as suffix, to provide a good selectivity, and the method reduces the search overhead.

keywords.kw: Apriori algorithm, Model_FP model, FP-growth method, Supporting System of Medical Decision

article_rec.title: The Research of MAS Dynamic Cooperation Model Based Role

abstract.par: This paper based on summarizing traditional several cooperation models, present a kind of MAS (multi- Agent systems) cooperation model based role (dynamic cooperative model, DCMBR). This paper introduces role notion to DCMBR, host-Agent decompounds the task, utilizes the role information library, search the appropriate Agent, makes up to a dynamic union, then realize MAS cooperation by task allocation mechanism, completes specific task.. We apply DCMBR model to the team design of robot football emulation game, get the anticipant effect.

keywords.kw: Agent, MAS, DCMBR, RoboCup, Rol Cooperation

article_rec.title: The Research of Plastic Gear Tooth Tip Modification and Rack Tool Root Modification

abstract.par: With the increasing application of plastic gears, the defects of the plastic gear design and manufacturing appears increasingly. Combining the plastic gears problems in the application and the problems of the plastic gear design and manufacturing appears in the company, we collect domestic and abroad information, ratiocinate and research the relationship between plastic gear modification and rack tool modification. Finally, we propose the trial-error theory in order to resolve minimum tip thickness problem, and apply this theory on spur gear for validation.

keywords.kw: plastic gear modification, rack tool root modification, trial-error theory, trial-error application

article_rec.title: The Research of Technique on Fabricating Hydrogel Scaffolds for Cartilage Tissue Engineering Based on Stereo-lithography

abstract.par: Based on stereo-lithography, the polyacrylamide hydrogel scaffolds with controlled accurate internal structures were fabricated. The structure accuracy of the scaffolds was evaluated by the size measurement compared with the CAD model. The mechanical property evaluation showed that the hydrogel compressive modulus of elasticity reached 4.54MPa, which was similar to that of the articular cartilage, therefore meeting the basic requirements of cartilage tissue engineering. The technique based on stereo-lithography showed promising in fabricating cartilage scaffolds.

keywords.kw: Hydrogel, Stereo-lithography, Cure depth

article_rec.title: The Research of Urban Air Pollution Weather Characteristics under the Special Terrain

abstract.par: Based on 2003-2009 air pollution monitoring data in Chongqing city, weather characteristics of pollution events are investigated. Results show that the major pollutant is PM10,., which has a “Dual Peak and Dual Valley” diurnal fluctuation The pollution weather has obvious seasonal and continuity characteristics and these pollution events mainly occur from late-Autumn to next early spring with persistent period for 2-7 days. The process of the pollution weather has a typical characteristics of atmospheric circulation, which local atmospheric circulations are equipped with low or mean pressure in the lower troposphere and zonal or northwest flows in the upper troposphere, resulting in overcast sky or rain-sunshine. In the process of the pollution weather, local meteorological elements have regular changes which in 24-hour the ground air pressure changes in negative, temperature changes in plus, average relative humidity is between 72% and 85%, the wind speed changes little which keeps 1- 2m/s, low-level inversion is evident. When the pollution weather is over, air pressure will pick up obviously, temperature will drop and relative humidity will increase.

keywords.kw: PM10, Air Pollution Index, Weather Characteristics

article_rec.title: The Research on Embedded Parallel Machine Tool Based on an Open Numerically Controlled Platform

abstract.par: This paper compares the characteristics of the numerically controlled systems of the parallel machine tools and the traditional ones. Based on an open numerically controlled platform, a method of developing the numerically controlled system of a parallel machine tool is proposed. So long as the numerical program is embedded into a mature numerically controlled platform as a functional module through a standard interface, the general function of the platform could be shared. Finally, we take a 5-strut-5-dof parallel kinematic machine tool, which is developed by ourselves, as an example. On the basis of EMC open numerically controlled platform, an inverse mathematical model is embedded into the parallel kinematic machine tool. After recompiling, a correct result is got. Thus we conclude that it is a fast, low-cost and very efficient method. The idea and methodology could also be applied to other numerically controlled systems of parallel machine tools.

keywords.kw: Parallel Machine Tool, Embedded Module, The Open Numerically Controlled System, EMC

article_rec.title: The Research on Multi-dimensional Numerical Analog Computation of Diesel Spray and Combustion Process

abstract.par: The combustion and spray process of DI diesel was calculated using CFD software – FIRE. Some important research information, including the distribution of the velocity of flow field, temperature field and cylinder pressure as well as heat release rate, were got and analyzed detailedly as a predictable reference for improving the structures of existing DI diesel and developing the new combustion systems.

keywords.kw: DI diesel, Numerical simulation, Combustion, Spray

article_rec.title: The Research on the Temperature Control Device for the Zipper-Molding Mechanism

abstract.par: According to the theory of thermal conductivity, this paper analyzes its reason contrapose this phenomenon the nylon lack of tenacity happens to crack when in the molding process. Meanwhile, this paper takes advantage of the soft ANSYS to analyze the center temperature distribution of the back mould in the molding process. The thermo-module which prevents this phenomenon from coming up, is redesigned to heat the nylon linear material plastic making in the molding screw. This module will decrease scrap page of zippers numerously.

keywords.kw: thermal conductivity, nylon zippers, the molding mechanism

article_rec.title: The Researches on Application of Outfield Technology on the Energy Regeneration of Municipal Sludge

abstract.par: two kinds of outfields (thermal and ultrasonic fields) were applied to pretreat the municipal sludge and the results were examined by the indexes of SCOD and PH. The “Hua’s 0.618 optimization method” was used to find out the optimum conditions when the sludge was treated with the outfields independently and orderly. It can be seen from the results that as the temperature goes high and the treating-time by the ultrasound goes long, the SCOD shows the trend of linear and exponent growth. When the two outfields affect independently, the optimum condition is 107℃by thermal and 55min by ultrasound with the raise of SCOD by 235.55% and 140.04% respectively. When the two outfields affect orderly, thermal-first shows advantage with the raise of SCDO by 337.40% to 297.71%. Meanwhile, there is no obvious difference in PH.

keywords.kw: pretreatment by outfield, Hua's 0.618 optimization method, municipal sludge

article_rec.title: The Self-Sealing Mechanism for Materials and Bonded Rings for Flange Joints

abstract.par: The Poisson's ratio of a material indicates both its liquid behavior and its incompressibility, the greater and nearer to 0.5 the Poisson's ratio of a solid material, the better its liquid behavior and its incompressibility. The sealing task for a self-sealing ring is to fully change the medium pressure on its inner cylinder orthogonally into the sealing stress on its end face. Therefore, any soft solid ring can work as a self-energizing seal when compensated for its axial deformation under radial pressure up to the orthogonally deformating degree of a liquid with a Poisson's ratio of 0.5 by a compensation angle.

keywords.kw: Axial seal, Radial seal, Sealing mechanism, Liquid flowing, Solid wedging, Primarily seated contact, Poisson's compensation angle, Bonded ring

article_rec.title: The Simulated Analysis Based on EMD and Shape Factor to Identify Damage Location of a Simple Supported Beam Steel Bridge

abstract.par: The purpose and significance of bridge health monitoring is described in this paper. Principle of empirical mode decomposition (EMD) and concept of shape factor are introduced. In order to study bridge health monitoring, Firstly, a finite element model for simply supported steel beam is set up on the basis of the Infinite Element Theory and the software ANSYS in response to laboratory experiment. The natural frequency index value and the rate of change can be calculated according to the time-displacemnt relation curve simulated through finite element method in the way of combining HHT and the frequently used Dimensionless parameters（shape factor）in traditional time-to-amplitude conversion analysis and adding instantaneous excitation to the mid-span, thus the location and the degree of damage can be efficiently identified. Finally, the improvements of this method are discussed.

keywords.kw: Hilbert-Huang Transform, Empirical Mode Decomposition, Shape Factor, Damage Location

article_rec.title: The Software Design of Data Acquisition Server Based on Multi-agent Technology

abstract.par: As the supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) system become more and more distributed and complex, the job of designing data acquisition server (DAS) software is very challenging. This paper advances a new design method for data acquisition server software based on multi-agent. By using multi-agent technology, the flexible intelligent communication protocol interface and optimal load balancing policy are designed to tackle the problems of variety communication protocols and heavy network loads. It can easily add new protocol or modify protocol without any modification of the protocol interface software's source code. So, the performance such as scalability and maintainability of the DAS has been greatly improved. This method has already been implemented in the real project, and the desirable result of application in this project field proves its validity.

keywords.kw: Data acquisition server, Multi-agent, Loadbalancing Protocol interface

article_rec.title: The Study of Adaptive Control of Hydraulic Generator Unit by Using GA-Improved Wavelet Neural Networks

abstract.par: Due to the highly complex dynamics of hydraulic generator unit, it is hard to develop an accurate analytical expression of the dynamic model, a new adaptive control algorithm based on the learning characteristic of neural network and the function approximation ability of the wavelet is presented in this paper. The control system consists of two wavelet networks, one realizes active identification and another control for hydraulic generator unit. Simulation results show that this control system is more effective than those based on neural networks.

keywords.kw: control, hydraulic generator unit, GA-improved wavelet, neural networks

article_rec.title: The Study of Piano Tuning System Based on the TMS320 Series DSP Chip

abstract.par: This paper describes the basic theory of piano tuning realization and its implementation of the application of the TMS320 series Digital Signal Processing (DSP) chip. On this basis, the basic idea of Fast Fourier Transform (FFT) algorithms in digital signal processing is then introduced.

keywords.kw: tuning, DSP, digital signal chip, FFT

article_rec.title: The Study of Recovering Iron by Melting Reduction from Copper Slag

abstract.par: Slag cleaning is important from both an economical and environmental perspective. The abundance of iron in the copper slag is well worth to reclaim. Recovering iron of copper slag was undertaken by melting reduction in this paper, the effects of C/Fe, the basicity and the holding time at 1773K were considered in this study. XRD analysis results indicated that the copper residue was mainly composed of 2FeO·SiO2 and other glassy silicates. DTG-DSC analysis results indicated that the reaction starting temperature was decreased from 1000K to 653K as the basicity raised from 0.187 to 1.2.In N2 atmosphere, the iron reduction rate was up to 92.44% under the condition of C/Fe=1.33,R=1.2,the holding time t=40min at T=1773K.

keywords.kw: copper slag, iron reclaimed, melting reduction

article_rec.title: The study of tower-inclination feature model under the normal state of tower crane

abstract.par: The tower crane fault status diagnosis has been one of difficult problems in the field of hoisting and transport. How to determine whether the tower crane steel structure meet the design requirements, and whether tower crane work normally and so on have been the trouble for all tower crane owners and managers. In this paper we studied the mechanical model of the tower crane under normal state and then obtained three inclination characteristics on the inclination of tower body top: First, when the tower crane acted upon by different hoisting moment, there is external envelope in the range of inclination that is tower body top relative to the vertical line, Second, when the moment acting on tower body top is zero, the inclination that is tower body top relative to the vertical line is on the line which sees the centre point in the inclination range under the unloaded state and centre point in the inclination range under rated loaded state as its endpoints, Third, the external envelope of tower body top inclination is limited, having testability. Through measuring the normal working state data of four kinds of common tower cranes, this paper draws to prove the correctness of it. TCBIM can be used for a variety of fault conditions and diagnosing whether tower crane is in the normal state. It is worthwhile for the similar diagnosis of all tower steel structure.

keywords.kw: tower crane, health state, mechanical model, top inclination characteristics

article_rec.title: The Technical Analysis of Geology Image Quality Enhancement

abstract.par: During the tunnel construction, as the structure of geology terrane outside of the tunnel is differ in thousands ways, also the builders’ interfere and so on. These reasons made the image of the tunnel face different. Usually the flow path of one image system is to deal with the iamge firstly. This stage is the primary stage of image processing. If this stage is not well, the work can not go on. In order to deal with image processing in the preprocessing stage better, this paper will put forward quality evaluation of image and airspace transformation strengthen so as to made the iamge applicable to the analysis of iamage system better.

keywords.kw: quality evaluation of image, airspace transformation, histogram equalization

article_rec.title: Theory Research and Error Analysis of Globoidal Indexing Cam

abstract.par: In this paper a new theory of one-side machining of the globoidal indexing cam be produced, which overcome the defects of enveloping method and solve the problem of tool control during machining the profile, meanwhile analysis such processing error, then simulate the process by using Pro/E to verify the feasibility of the method, the process provide a theoretical basis for special NC machine.

keywords.kw: Globoidal Indexing Cam, Processing Error Analysis, One-side Machining, Simulate Introduction

article_rec.title: Thermal Treatment of Coal-Gangue
article_rec.subtitle: Activation and Relevant Factors

abstract.par: This paper presents a systematic study of the thermal activation of coal-gangue and factors that influence this process under different conditions. Our samples were tested and analyzed using Differential Thermal Analysis (DTA), X-ray diffraction (XRD), Fourier Transform Infrared Spectroscopy (FTIR), Inductive Coupled Plasma-Atomic Emission Spectroscopy (ICP-AES), Magic Angle Spin Nuclear Magnetic Resonance (MAS NMR), and Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM). Results indicate that the degree of coal-gangue activation varies with variations in the phase structure and coordination of aluminum at different temperatures. Coal-gangue activation is also found to be impacted by such factors as particle diameter, detention time, and cooling mode.

keywords.kw: Coal-gangue, Thermal activation, Coordination, Factors of Relevance

article_rec.title: Thermodynamic Model and General Expressions of the SAM on the Bisic Thermodynamics Laws

abstract.par: The Surrounding Analysis Method（SAM）in thermodynamics was founded by professor Chen Guitang of Jilin University. It is a new distinctive course theory system, which is found on the recent knowledge. The SAM is not only due to Professor Chen’s long-term teaching experience in thermodynamics, but also due to his thorough study for every classical thermodynamic theory system. The SAM studies the equilibrium of system and the changing course of state based on the root causes called inner cause and outer causes. When applying the SAM, the different factors effecting the state change of system can be clearly identified. The degree of each influence on the state change of system can also be clearly known. Its new definitions, concepts and expressions are more inclusiveness and more universal applicability. The SAM has the more applicability in teaching and engineering practice. It has positive influence on the development of classical thermodynamics. The basic guidance ideas of the SAM, the thermodynamic model,the general expressions of basic laws of thermodynamics and its characteristics are introduced in the paper.

keywords.kw: thermodynamics, SAM system, energy equation, entropy equation, exergy equation

article_rec.title: Three-Dimensional Zone Method Mathematic Model on Conventional Reheating Furnace

abstract.par: Based on energy balance, a three-dimensional zone method mathematic model on conventional reheating furnace is set up. By coupling with heat flux of slab surface, the temperature fields of furnace gas zones and furnace wall zones is obtained by using the main variable-correction method, and slab temperature fields by finite difference method. Under typical working condition, the model is verified by the testing data. The influences of thermodynamic operating parameter and structural parameter on heat transfer process under steady working conditions without changing the productivity are quantitatively researched.

keywords.kw: zone method, the main variable-correction method, convenctional reheating furnace, finite difference method

article_rec.title: Time Domain Analysis of Continuous Systems for Solving Zero-state Response Attention

abstract.par: This article aims to discuss the "Signals and Systems" course of teaching time-domain analysis on the continuous system for solving zero-state response should pay attention to. This paper analyzes the classic Method and Solution of LTI system impulse response zero when the state should pay attention to, error-prone and easy to confuse the issue point. These easily overlooked and the error has his own ideas and process skills.

keywords.kw: classical solutions, impulse response, zero-state response, Confusion

article_rec.title: Tower-Topology of Fuzzy Optimization Bp Neural Networks and a Case Study

abstract.par: Fuzzy optimization neural networks combines neural networks model with fuzzy optimization model,its application must establishes fixed expression topology according to actual problem. Aiming at the experiments in which multiple stages, influence factors and treatment levels should be considered, a tower-topology is established to simulate relationships between factors and results in this paper. In the topology, useless connections must be deleted and connection weights are constrained in [0, 1]. Through a case study of irrigation experiments, the relationship between treatment levels and yield is presented by more precisely than a traditional model.

keywords.kw: Fuzzy optimization neural networks, tower-topology, simulate, connections weights

article_rec.title: Transport Planning Strategy Study Based on Target Integrated Safety, Health, Justice and Environment-friendship Concepts

abstract.par: This paper starts with the transport problems to aim at reducing road traffic pollution, improving traffic safety and emphasizing the role of human being, then integrates safety, health, justice, environment-friendship concepts into transport planning. From different levels (urban and neighborhood) and the demand of different groups, it formulates the corresponding concrete measures so as to promote sustainable development for urban road traffic.

keywords.kw: security, health, justice, environment-friendship, transport planning

article_rec.title: Uncertainty of Counteracting Force at Joints and Establishment and Analysis of the Dynamic Modeling of Grippers for Large Scale Heavy Duty Forging Manipulators

abstract.par: The paper presents the concept of the Response Dead Zone of counteracting force, analyzes the changing law of kinematic pairs’ counteracting forces during the operation of large scale heavy duty grippers. The dynamic equations of the gripping mechanism which takes the friction of kinematic pairs into consideration are established. On top of that, we further investigate the reasons that result in the uncertainty of the counteracting forces of kinematic pairs and the incompleteness of the mechanism dynamic model. Finally, as a conclusion, the method of the friction condition’s judgment is proposed and the fiction constraint equations are established, which make the mechanism dynamic model become complete and solvable.

keywords.kw: Response Dead Zone of Counteracting Force, large scale heavy duty Gripper, Mechanism Dynamic Mode, Fiction Constraint Equation

article_rec.title: Underground Backfilling Technology for Waste Dump Disposal in Coal Mining District

abstract.par: China is one of the few countries over the world which uses coal as the main energy, and its coal production has become more than one third of the world. To cope with the serious problems caused by the coal exploitation such as waste discharge, environment destruction and land occupation, harmonious development of coal mines green exploitation and ecological environment has been suggested by Chinese scholars. This paper systematically introduces the general framework of underground backfilling technology for waste dumps disposal. The surface waste crushing and conveyance system, deep vertical feeding system used to convey waste from surface to underground, underground conveyance system, backfilling system layout of fully mechanized long wall mining with solid material backfilling technology, key equipment and backfill technics were researched and developed. The engineering application indicates: using the fully mechanized mining with solid material backfilling technology can dispose waste 30,000 to 50,000 tons while exploit coal 50,000 to 80,000 tons per month, so that a higher production, more effective recovery and environmental benefits will be realized.

keywords.kw: Coal mining district, Waste dumps, Environment destruction, Deep vertical feeding system, Fully mechanized longwall solid material backfilling mining, Backfilling equipment

article_rec.title: Using Modified Bentonite Coagulation-acidation for COD and Color Removal from Scouring Effluent

abstract.par: In this work, chemical oxygen demand (COD) removal and decolorization of polyester scouring effluent by coagulation-acidation have been studied experimentally. Acidulated bentonite was used as coagulant. The effects of bentonite dosage, PAM dosage, stirring time, and pH after acidation on the efficiency of COD and color reduction were studied by orthogonal methodology. Finally the optimum conditions have been obtained. The products of coagulation and acidation were test by Fourier transform infrared spectra. It has been concluded that the most of residual color and suspended solid are removed during the coagulation process and the acidation product is terephthalic acid. Under the optimum condition, the removal efficiencies of COD and color are 79.7% and 90%, respectively.

keywords.kw: Scouring Effluent, Coagulation, Acidation, COD, Color

article_rec.title: Utilization and Harvest of Desert Brush

abstract.par: plenty of desert brush grows in the north of China. Brush does not only have great influence on ecology, which serves for conserving soil and water and checking winds and fix drifting sand, but also have great benefits on economy, which serves as energy forest, raw material forest and forage forest. In order to solve the problem of cutting brush in sandy area in north of China, a self-propelled walking brush cutter was designed. This article introduces its design requirements, working principle and structure features. A series of experiments were carried out with this machine. The results indicated that using this machine to cut brush the stubble after cutting could be left under 8cm, working efficiency was as high as 0.1 hm2h-1 and the amount of newly growed branches was twice as much as it was before.

keywords.kw: desert brush, brush cutter, harvest

article_rec.title: Utilization of Red Mud for the Preparation of Lightweight Aggregates

abstract.par: The few reuse and large stockpile of red mud led to a series of social and environmental problems. Preparation of lightweight aggregates (LWA), using red mud as main raw material, and waste glass and bentonite as additives, was investigated in this study, and the crystalline phases and internal structure of the obtained LWA were characterized. The optimum preparation conditions of LWA were as following: the weight ratio of red mud/ waste glass/ bentonite at 70:15:15, heating at 550℃ for 15min, sintering at 1120℃ for 40min, under which the LWA with the bulk density of 1.08 gּ cm-3, water absorption rate (WAR) of 10.45 % and cylinder compressive strength (CCS) of 8.22 MPa was obtained, and met the requirements of GB/T 17431.1-1998 for LWA. The crystalline phases present in the LWA mainly was gehlenite, andradite and schorlonite, different from calcite, hematite and calcium titan ate in red mud based on XRD, which were observed with the abundant pores in the internal structure of the LWA based on the digital photo.

keywords.kw: red mud, bentonite, waste glass, crystalline phase, lightweight aggregate, internal structure

article_rec.title: Utilization Secondary Energy in Integrated Iron and Steel Works for Improving Energy Utilization Efficiency

abstract.par: Iron and steel industry is energy and resource intensive industry, also is typical process industry, which can produce amount of residual heat and waste energy when producing iron and steel product coinciding with consuming lots of power and steam. In this paper, feasibility study of utilization secondary energy to improve energy utilization efficiency in iron and steel industry is discussed. Energy balance and byproduct gases recovery are analyzed by mathematical expresses, and current status and potential of utilization byproduct gases for combined heat and power are described. Research results indicated that it is more and more important that using the secondary energy resource such as byproduct gases, steam in the iron and steel industry for improving energy utilization efficiency to energy saving and environment protection.

keywords.kw: secondary energy, iron and steel, byproduct gases, energy efficiency, energy saving

article_rec.title: Vehicle Guidance Algorithm Considering Delays at Intersections

abstract.par: In urban traffic network, there is turning delays and turning prohibition etc. So it is more practical to use the algorithm considering delays at intersections than general algorithm to search optimal route. In order to save space, this paper proposes a new modified forward star storage structure, which can store road network with node turning delays. And we improve A* algorithm scientifically, road impedance differences brought by drivers’ turning behavior and traffic control behavior such as turning prohibition can be reflected effectively in the process of searching optimal route. Finally, take specific road network for instance, the algorithm’s feasibility is verified.

keywords.kw: A* Algorithm, Optimal Route, New Modified Forward Star Storage Structure, Turning Delays, ITS

article_rec.title: Velocity Control of Permanent Magnet Synchronous Motor Based on Second-Order Sliding-Mode Technology

abstract.par: A scheme for the speed control of permanent-magnet synchronous motor (PMSM), based on second order sliding-mode-control (SO-SMC) algorithm using proportional-plus-integral (PI) sliding plane, is presented in this paper. The model of the PMSM, based on field-oriented, is given and both of second-order sliding mode control law and PI sliding plan are discussed also. Some experiments of simulations have been made for examine the effects of the scheme. And the results show that the method motioned in this paper represents more accurate tracking and robust performance than conventional first order sliding-mode-control (FO-SMC) under uncertainty about the motor and load parameters and external load disturbances.

keywords.kw: velocity control, second order sliding-mode-control (2-SMC), proportional-plus-integral(PI)slidingsurface, permanent-magnet synchronous motor (PMSM) drivers

article_rec.title: Vibration Testing and Analysis of Dynamic Characteristics of a Reconfigurable Turn-Milling Machine Tool

abstract.par: This paper focuses on a case study on dynamic characteristics analysis and dynamic stiffness evaluation of a reconfigurable turn-milling machine tool. The structural dynamics analysis and evaluation on CNC machines, which has become one of the utmost technologies to resolve vibration problems, is frequently applied for detecting machine anti-vibration property and evaluating vibration analysis accuracy. In this study, natural frequency and corresponding vibration modes of the reconfigurable turn-milling machine tool were analyzed by using both FEA and vibration testing. Furthermore, dynamic stiffness of the machine tool was analyzed. Both the theoretical analysis and test results showed fairly good coherence. Finally, some further discussions were made based on the analysis results from the point of view of resonant vibration.

keywords.kw: dynamic characteristics. dynamic stiffness. exciter test, modal analysis, reconfigurable turn-milling machine tool

article_rec.title: Vibrometer's Measurement Technology in High Temperature

abstract.par: The high-speed flight's body surface’s temperature may surpass 1000℃ by the influence of air friction, therefore the thermostable measuring technique is one of key technologies in this kind of weapon experiments. In missile's ground experiment environment, the acceleration instrument all around uses the high temperature spotlight illumination to elevate temperature, this temperature may reach 1400℃. In order to surveys vibration signal on shell body surface under this high temperature, we needs to carry on thermal protection to the ordinary accelerometers. This paper introduced one kind of accelerometers high temperature-surveys technology, designed the thermal protection and refrigerate the structural, realizes oscillation measuring technique in high temperature, and through the ANSYS simulation and related experimental verification structure reliability.

keywords.kw: sensor, thermal protection, high-temperature, ANSYS, thermodynamics simulation

article_rec.title: Video Image Acquisition System Based on Embedded Linux

abstract.par: Nowadays, embedded system is one of most popular and promising fields of IT applications, and embedded technology will be more extensive development. ARM processor becomes a mainstream processor in the embedded system because of the characteristics of high cost and low power cost. A video acquisition system using ARMS3C2440 microprocessor is designed, and the entire functional module based on V4L is realized. Vimicro USB camera device is used in the video acquisition system, and its driver is completed. The final experimental results show that can achieve capture continuously clear images, capability of the system is excellent, and the system is practical.

keywords.kw: ARMS3C2440, V4L, USB camera, video acquisition

article_rec.title: Volumetric Mass Transfer Coefficients of Dilute SO2 Absorption into Sodium Alkali Solution in Packed Column

abstract.par: In order to investigate the characteristics of the reaction between SO2 in flue gas and Na2SO3, the effective ingredient in absorption solution during the process of sodium alkali FGD. The volumetric overall mass transfer coefficient(KGa) for SO2 removal from flue gas into aqueous solution of Na2SO3 was studied in a packing column with PP rosette packing. The KGa value was evaluated over ranges of main operating variables, the concentration of SO2 in inlet gas, gas flow rate, the liquid sprayed density and Na+ concentration in solution. And the experimental results indicate that the effect of SO2 concentration in inlet gas,gas flow rate and liquid sprayed density on KGa is significant. KGa could be improved by increasing gas flow rate and liquid sprayed density, and by decreasing SO2 concentration in inlet gas. The concentration of Na+ in absorbent has no significant impact on KGa.

keywords.kw: sulfur dioxide, packed column, absorption, volumetric overall mass transfer coefficient

article_rec.title: Wear Mechanism of Coated Tool During High Speed Machining

abstract.par: A methodology based on high speed cutting experimental test and observational methods for analyzing wear course of coated tool in milling cast iron and quenched and tempered 45 steel by coated cemented carbide inserts is introduced. The applied coatings were TiCN and TiAlN films. The geometrical model of coated tool abrasion is offered and analyzed all possible abrasion morphology of coating. Stress distributed state graph and curve of temperature versus distance from cutting edge were obtained for analysis of coated tool wear mechanism. The milling investigations were conducted at various cutting speeds and feed rates. Through analysis about the impact of cutting speed and feed on roughness, a sufficient correlation of coatings’ impact resistance at various temperatures with their cutting performance at corresponding cutting speeds and feeds was revealed.

keywords.kw: Wear, Mechanism, Coated tool, High speed machining

article_rec.title: Wheat Image Correction for Feature Segmentation Based on Color Linear CCD

abstract.par: This paper presented a machine vision system with a color linear CCD to identify several China wheat classes. However, these images were deformed due to color linear CCD itself, image noise and uneven brightness also existed. The image needs to be corrected so as to segment the wheat features better. Algorithms of linearity equation were developed to correct geometric distortions, homomorphic filtering and space domain enhancement methods for image restoration also played a significant role. From the evaluation, we could find that the image treatment was likely to effective.

keywords.kw: wheat image, color linear CCD, image correction, feature

article_rec.title: Author Index - Volume 2
